title: MS AccessCos()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MS AccessCos()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the cosine of an angle:
SELECT Cos(5) AS CosNum;

Definition and Usage
The Cos() function returns the cosine of an angle.
Syntax
Cos(
number
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
number
Required. A numeric value
Technical Details
Works in:
From Access 2000

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers MS AccessCos()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MS AccessCos()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MS AccessCos()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
